body_html:
Hey @klappradla I've tested the PR locally.
The table looks great!
I found a couple of issues with the csv export.

  1. When the table is already exported, I continue seeing this button:

    I can make a new export only after I refresh the page.

  2. I think something went wrong with the last table columns: I'm not sure what Picks1,2 and Likes 1,2 mean; what the next two columns mean (the average rate for one team is 1.55, but there is no such number in the exported table); the last two columns don't have a header.


Another thing: these changes #725 disappeared for me, when I tested this PR. I guess it's just me not merging with the master branch.

body:
Hey @klappradla I've tested the PR locally.
The table looks great! 
I found a couple of issues with the csv export.

1. When the table is already exported, I continue seeing this button:
![joxi_screenshot_1490999288291](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/24571807/fa7d92a0-1673-11e7-8156-75c06e11f4b1.png)
I can make a new export only after I refresh the page.

2. I think something went wrong with the last table columns: I'm not sure what Picks1,2 and Likes 1,2 mean; what the next two columns mean (the average rate for one team is 1.55, but there is no such number in the exported table); the last two columns don't have a header.

![screen shot 2017-04-01 at 00 31 19](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/24571834/2da14816-1674-11e7-8f8e-4ed014143316.png)
![screen shot 2017-04-01 at 00 31 56](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/24571833/2da1389e-1674-11e7-9981-492c6c9b04f4.png)

---

Another thing: these changes https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/725 disappeared for me, when I tested this PR. I guess it's just me not merging with the master branch.
